trans-unit.source: A runtime object that references a speech recognition grammar, which an application can use to define the constraints for speech recognition.
trans-unit.target: Kjøretidsobjektet som refererer til en tale recognition grammatikk der et program kan definerer begrensninger for talegjenkjenning.

trans-unit.source: A speech recognition grammar is a set of rules or constraints that define what a speech recognition engine can recognize as meaningful input.
trans-unit.target: En tale recognition grammatikk er et sett med regler eller begrensninger som definerer en motor for talegjenkjenning kan gjenkjenne som betydning inndata.

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating and using speech recognition grammars, see [Speech Recognition](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/6a7dc524-07fc-4862-8d48-8c10dc64b919), [Create Grammars Using XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/2d799487-49c6-4cc9-b42f-f71cd3824fe1), [Create Grammars Using GrammarBuilder](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/7e2cc577-cb05-4318-9da3-7c8675d3d9ae), and [Create Grammars Using SrgsGrammar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e4d9f96e-2241-4c39-b9e0-ac9ef4e9a906).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om å opprette og bruke tale recognition grammars [talegjenkjenning](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/6a7dc524-07fc-4862-8d48-8c10dc64b919), [opprette Grammars ved hjelp av XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/2d799487-49c6-4cc9-b42f-f71cd3824fe1), [opprette Grammars ved hjelp av GrammarBuilder](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/7e2cc577-cb05-4318-9da3-7c8675d3d9ae), og [opprette Grammars ved hjelp av SrgsGrammar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e4d9f96e-2241-4c39-b9e0-ac9ef4e9a906).

trans-unit.source: After you author a grammar, you must build it into a Grammar object that a speech recognition engine can load and that your application can use at runtime to manage speech recognition.
trans-unit.target: Når du skriver et grammatikk, må du bygge den til en grammatikk-objektet som en motor for talegjenkjenning kan laste og programmet kan bruke under kjøring til å administrere talegjenkjenning.

trans-unit.source: You can use a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.%23ctor%2A> constructor to create a Grammar instance from a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> or a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> object, or from a file or a <xref:System.IO.Stream> that contains a description of a grammar in a supported format.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.%23ctor%2A>konstruktøren for å opprette en forekomst av grammatikk fra en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>objekt, eller fra en fil eller <xref:System.IO.Stream>som inneholder en beskrivelse av grammatikk i et format som støttes.</xref:System.IO.Stream> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Supported formats include the following: - XML-format files that conform to the W3C [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761) - Grammars that have been compiled to a binary file with a .cfg file extension Grammar constructors that accept XML-format grammar files in their arguments compile the XML grammars to a binary format to optimize them for loading and consumption by a speech recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: Formater som støttes omfatter følgende:-filer i XML-format som samsvarer med W3C [tale Recognition grammatikk spesifikasjonen (SRGS) versjon 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761) -Grammars er kompilert til en binær fil med en alle cfg filen filtypen grammatikk konstruktører som tillater filer i XML-format grammatikk i tilhørende argumentene kompileres XML-grammars til et binært format til å optimalisere dem for innlasting og forbruk av en motor for talegjenkjenning.

trans-unit.source: You can reduce the amount of time required to construct a Grammar object from an XML-format grammar by compiling the grammar in advance, using one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarCompiler.Compile%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Du kan redusere tiden som kreves for å lage et grammatikk objekt fra en XML-format grammatikk ved kompilering grammatikk på forhånd, ved hjelp av en av de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarCompiler.Compile%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarCompiler.Compile%2A>

trans-unit.source: An application's speech recognition engine, as managed by a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> object, can load multiple speech recognition grammars.
trans-unit.target: Et program motor for talegjenkjenning, som administreres av en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>objekt, kan laste inn flere tale recognition grammars.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: The application can independently enable or disable individual grammars by setting the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Enabled%2A> property, and modify recognition behavior through Grammar properties, such as the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Priority%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Weight%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Programmet uavhengig kan aktivere eller deaktivere individuelle grammars ved å angi den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Enabled%2A>egenskapen og endre recognition virkemåte gjennom grammatikk egenskaper som den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Priority%2A>og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Weight%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Weight%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Priority%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The grammar’s <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> event is raised when input matches a path through the grammar.
trans-unit.target: Grammatikken <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized>denne hendelsen oppstår når inndataene samsvarer med en bane til grammatikk.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > It is a best practice to verify the safety of any URI or DLL used to build a Grammar object.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Det er lurt å kontrollere at alle URI eller DLL-filen som brukes til å lage et grammatikk-objekt.

trans-unit.source: > > Windows and the Speech platform provide security for applications constructing a Grammar instance from a DLL or from a grammar that supports scripting.
trans-unit.target: >> Angi sikkerhet for å opprette en forekomst av grammatikk fra en DLL-fil eller en grammatikk som støtter skripting programmer Windows og tale-plattformen.

trans-unit.source: > > Scripts in Grammar objects are always run as if downloaded from a web page in the `Internet Zone`.
trans-unit.target: >> Skript i grammatikk objektene kjøres alltid som om lastet ned fra en webside i den `Internet Zone`.

trans-unit.source: The Common Language Runtime (CLR) isolates any DLL loaded to obtain a grammar definition.
trans-unit.target: Common Language Runtime (CLR) isoleres alle DLL-filer som er lastet inn for å få en grammatikk definisjon.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> class

trans-unit.source: This constructor does not pass any parameters to the initialization handler, and the description should not define an initialization handler that requires arguments.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren sende ikke parametrene til initialisering behandlingsprogram, og beskrivelsen kan ikke definere en initialisering behandlingsprogrammet som krever argumenter.

trans-unit.source: This constructor can create a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> instance from the following formats: - XML-format files that conform to the W3C [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761) - Grammars that have been compiled to a binary file with a .cfg file extension This constructor compiles XML-format grammar files to a binary format to optimize them for loading and consumption by a speech recognition engine.

trans-unit.source: You can reduce the amount of time required to construct a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object from an XML-format grammar by compiling the grammar in advance, using one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarCompiler.Compile%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Du kan redusere tiden som kreves for å lage en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objektet fra en XML-format grammatikk ved kompilering grammatikk på forhånd, ved hjelp av en av de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarCompiler.Compile%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarCompiler.Compile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: An SRGS grammar can define a root rule.
trans-unit.target: En SRGS grammatikk kan definere en rot-regel.

trans-unit.source: To create a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object from a stream and specify a root rule, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.%23ctor%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Opprette en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objekt fra en dataflyt og angi en rot regel, bruker du <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.%23ctor%2A>eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.target: Opprette en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objekt fra en dataflyt og angi en basis-URIEN brukes til å løse referanser til relativ regel, bruker den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: This constructor does not pass any parameters to the initialization handler, and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> should not contain an initialization handler that requires arguments.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren ikke sende parametere til initialisering-behandlingsprogrammet og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>kan ikke inneholde en initialisering behandlingsprogrammet som krever argumenter.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>

trans-unit.source: To create a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object from a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> and specify a base URI to use to resolve relative rule references, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.%23ctor%2A> constructor.

trans-unit.target: Begrensninger for tale recognition grammatikk.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> class from a file and specifies a root rule.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref> klasse fra en fil, og angir en rot-regel.

trans-unit.source: This constructor does not pass any parameters to the initialization handler, and the description should not define an initialization handler that requires arguments.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren sende ikke parametrene til initialisering behandlingsprogram, og beskrivelsen kan ikke definere en initialisering behandlingsprogrammet som krever argumenter.

trans-unit.source: This constructor can create a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> instance from the following formats: - XML-format files that conform to the W3C [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761) - Grammars that have been compiled to a binary file with a .cfg file extension This constructor compiles XML-format grammar files to a binary format to optimize them for loading and consumption by a speech recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren kan opprette en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>forekomst fra følgende formater:-filer i XML-format som samsvarer med W3C [tale Recognition grammatikk spesifikasjonen (SRGS) versjon 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761) -Grammars er kompilert til en binær fil med filtypen alle cfg denne konstruktøren kompilerer filer i XML-format grammatikk til et binært format til å optimalisere dem for innlasting og forbruk av en motor for talegjenkjenning.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: You can reduce the amount of time required to construct a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object from an XML-format grammar by compiling the grammar in advance, using one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarCompiler.Compile%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Du kan redusere tiden som kreves for å lage en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objektet fra en XML-format grammatikk ved kompilering grammatikk på forhånd, ved hjelp av en av de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarCompiler.Compile%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarCompiler.Compile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: To create a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> that specifies a base URI to use to resolve relative rule references, open a file stream for the file and use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Opprette en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>som angir en basis-URIEN til å bruke referanser relativ regel, åpne en filstrøm for filen og bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the rule to use as the entry point of the speech recognition grammar, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to use the default root rule of the grammar description.

trans-unit.source: This constructor can create a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> instance from the following formats: - XML-format files that conform to the W3C [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761) - Grammars that have been compiled to a binary file with a .cfg file extension This constructor compiles XML-format grammar files to a binary format to optimize them for loading and consumption by a speech recognition engine.

trans-unit.source: This constructor does not validate `baseUri`.

trans-unit.source: However, the `LoadGrammar` method of a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> object throws an exception if it cannot resolve all of the rule references in the grammar description.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid den `LoadGrammar` -metoden til et <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>objektet oppstår det et unntak hvis den ikke kan løse alle regelen-referanser i grammatikk beskrivelsen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: If `baseUri` is not `null`, the `LoadGrammar` method uses the URI to resolve any rule references that it cannot otherwise resolve.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `baseUri` er ikke `null`, `LoadGrammar` metoden bruker URIEN til å løse eventuelle regelen referanser den ellers ikke kan løse.

trans-unit.source: If `baseUri` represents a file, then the `LoadGrammar` uses both the designated file and the file's directory when it attempts to resolve relative rule references.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `baseUri` representerer en fil, og deretter den `LoadGrammar` bruker både den angitte fil- og filens når den prøver å løse relativ regelen referanser.

trans-unit.target: Identifikatoren for regelen som skal brukes som inngangspunktet for tale recognition-grammatikk eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> å bruke standard roten regelen for grammatikk beskrivelsen.

trans-unit.source: The base URI to use to resolve any relative rule reference in the grammar description, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Basis-URIEN brukes til å løse relativ regelen referanser i beskrivelsen av grammatikk eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Parameters to be passed to the initialization handler specified by the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.OnInit*> property for the entry point or the root rule of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> to be created.
trans-unit.target: Parametere som skal sendes til initialisering behandlingsprogrammet som er angitt av den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.OnInit*>for inngangspunktet eller regelen roten av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref> som skal opprettes.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.OnInit*>

trans-unit.source: This parameter may be null.
trans-unit.target: Denne parameteren kan være null.

trans-unit.source: - Any of the parameters contain an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: -Noen av parameterne inneholder en ugyldig verdi.

trans-unit.source: - The stream is connected to a grammar that does not contain the rule specified by ruleName.
trans-unit.target: - stream Er koblet til en grammatikk som ikke inneholder den angitte av regelen ruleName .

trans-unit.source: - The contents of the array parameters do not match the arguments of any of the rule's initialization handlers.
trans-unit.target: -Innholdet i matriseparametere samsvarer ikke med argumenter for regelens initialisering behandlingsprogrammer.

trans-unit.source: - The grammar contains a relative rule reference that cannot be resolved by the default base rule for grammars or the URI supplied by baseUri.
trans-unit.target: -Grammatikk inneholder en relativ Regelreferanse som ikke kan løses ved standard grunntallet regel for grammars eller URIEN ble levert av baseUri .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> class from an instance of <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref>, and specifies the name of a rule to be the entry point to the grammar and a base URI to resolve relative references.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref> klassen fra en forekomst av <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref>, og angir navnet på en regel inngangspunktet grammatikk og basis-URIEN ikke løse relative referanser.

trans-unit.source: Parameters for an initialization handler may also be specified.
trans-unit.target: Parameterne for en initialisering håndterer kan også angis.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> that contains the constraints for the speech recognition grammar.
trans-unit.target: En forekomst av <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> som inneholder begrensningene for tale recognition grammatikk.

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the rule to use as the entry point of the speech recognition grammar, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to use the default root rule of the grammar description.
trans-unit.target: Identifikatoren for regelen som skal brukes som inngangspunktet for tale recognition-grammatikk eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> å bruke standard roten regelen for grammatikk beskrivelsen.

trans-unit.source: The base URI to use to resolve any relative rule reference in the grammar description, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Basis-URIEN brukes til å løse relativ regelen referanser i beskrivelsen av grammatikk eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Parameters to be passed to the initialization handler specified by the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.OnInit*> property for the entry point or the root rule of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> to be created.This parameter may be null.
trans-unit.target: Parametere som skal sendes til initialisering behandlingsprogrammet som er angitt av egenskapen <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.OnInit*>for inngangspunktet eller root-regel for den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref> som skal opprettes. Denne parameteren kan være null.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.OnInit*>

trans-unit.source: - Any of the parameters contain an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: -Noen av parameterne inneholder en ugyldig verdi.

trans-unit.source: - The specified by srgsDocument does not contain the rule specified in ruleName.
trans-unit.target: - Angitt av srgsDocument inneholder ikke den angitte i regelen ruleName .

trans-unit.source: - The contents of the array parameters do not match the arguments of any of the rule's initialization handlers.
trans-unit.target: -Innholdet i matriseparametere samsvarer ikke med argumenter for regelens initialisering behandlingsprogrammer.

trans-unit.source: - The grammar has a relative rule reference that cannot be resolved by the default base rule for grammars or the URI supplied by baseUri.
trans-unit.target: -Grammatikk har en relativ regelen ikke kan løses av standard base regel for grammars eller URIEN ble levert av baseUri .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that controls whether a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> can be used by a speech recognizer to perform recognition.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som bestemmer om en <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref> kan brukes av en tale gjenkjenner til å utføre gjenkjenning.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> may be enabled or disabled independently of being loaded by a speech recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: En forekomst av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>kan være aktivert eller deaktivert uavhengig av blir lastet inn av en motor for talegjenkjenning.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_Enabled" name="Enabled" href=""></xref> property returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a speech recognizer can perform recognition using the speech recognition grammar; otherwise the property returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref uid="langword_csharp_Enabled" name="Enabled" href=""> </xref> returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> Hvis en tale gjenkjenner kan utføre føring ved hjelp av tale recognition grammatikk; ellers returnerer egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets whether a grammar is strongly typed.
trans-unit.target: Henter om en grammatikk skrives på det sterkeste.

trans-unit.source: A strongly-typed <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object (`IsStg` equals `true`) can return strongly-typed results (objects, rather than raw text) to a client application.
trans-unit.target: En strongly-typed <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objektet (`IsStg` er lik `true`) kan returnere strongly-typed resultater (objekter i stedet raw tekst) til et klientprogram.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: For example, a strongly-typed grammar might return <xref:System.DateTime> objects rather than raw recognized input.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel en strongly-typed grammatikk kan returnere <xref:System.DateTime>objekter i stedet for rå gjenkjent inndata.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: You can implement strongly-typed grammars by attaching code to the rules of a grammar.
trans-unit.target: Du kan implementere strongly-typed grammars ved å knytte kode til reglene for en grammatikk.

trans-unit.source: As a recognition engine processes any given rule, taking as input the current partial results, the associated code is executed and the textual information becomes rich type objects.
trans-unit.target: Når en recognition-motor behandler alle typer regler, ta som inndata gjeldende delvise resultater, tilknyttede koden utføres og samme blir rik typen objekter.

trans-unit.source: This allows a client to more easily make use of enhanced semantic checking, support for multiple cultures, and internal grammar logic.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at en klient foreta enklere å bruke utvidet semantisk kontroll, støtte for flere kulturer og intern grammatikk logic.

trans-unit.source: Instances of strongly-typed <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects are typically obtained from resources in an assembly as a <xref:System.Type> of the Common Language Runtime (CLR).
trans-unit.target: Forekomster av strongly-typed <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objekter vanligvis er hentet fra ressurser i en samling som en <xref:System.Type>for Common Language Runtime (CLR).</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: The localized types used to support different languages are examples of such <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects.
trans-unit.target: Lokaliserte typene brukes til å støtte forskjellige språk er eksempler på for eksempel <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objekter.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_IsStg" name="IsStg" href=""></xref> property returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the grammar is strongly-typed; otherwise the property returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref uid="langword_csharp_IsStg" name="IsStg" href=""> </xref> returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> Hvis grammatikk strongly-typed; ellers returneres <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets whether a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> has been loaded by a speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Henter om en <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref> er lastet inn av en tale gjenkjenner.

trans-unit.source: Once a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> has been loaded, the values of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Weight%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Priority%2A> cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: Når en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>er lastet inn, verdiene i <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Weight%2A>, og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Priority%2A>kan ikke endres.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Priority%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Weight%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_Loaded" name="Loaded" href=""></xref> property returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the referenced speech recognition grammar is currently loaded in a speech recognizer; otherwise the property returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref uid="langword_csharp_Loaded" name="Loaded" href=""> </xref> returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> Hvis refererte tale recognition grammatikk er lastet inn i en tale gjenkjenner; ellers returnerer egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_LoadLocalizedGrammarFromType" name="LoadLocalizedGrammarFromType" href=""></xref> method returns a localized instance of a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> object derived from <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref uid="langword_csharp_LoadLocalizedGrammarFromType" name="LoadLocalizedGrammarFromType" href=""> </xref> metoden returnerer en lokalisert forekomst av en <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref> objektet som er avledet fra <xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Localized grammars obtained with `LoadLocalizedGrammarFromType` are typically strongly-typed (see <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.IsStg%2A> for more information on strongly typed grammars).
trans-unit.target: Lokalisert grammars innhentet med `LoadLocalizedGrammarFromType` er vanligvis strongly-typed (se <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.IsStg%2A>for mer informasjon om forespørselsparameter av sterk type grammars).</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.IsStg%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `onInitParameters` is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) the localized grammar should have either no initialization method, or a method that takes no arguments.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `onInitParameters` er en nullreferanse (ingenting i Visual Basic) den lokaliserte grammatikk må ha ingen initialiseringsmetode eller en metode som tar noen argumenter.

trans-unit.source: In an assembly, the <xref:System.Type> of an object based on <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: I en samling av <xref:System.Type>til et objekt som er basert på <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Parameters to be passed to an initialization method of the localizedobject based on <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Parametere som skal sendes til en initialiseringsmetode av localizedobject basert på <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This parameter may be null.
trans-unit.target: Denne parameteren kan være null.

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_LoadLocalizedGrammarFromType" name="LoadLocalizedGrammarFromType" href=""></xref> method returns a valid object based on <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there has been an error.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref uid="langword_csharp_LoadLocalizedGrammarFromType" name="LoadLocalizedGrammarFromType" href=""> </xref> metoden returnerer et gyldig objekt basert på <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref>, eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis det har oppstått en feil.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på en <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_Name" name="Name" href=""></xref> property returns the name of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref uid="langword_csharp_Name" name="Name" href=""> </xref> egenskapen returnerer navnet på den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the priority value of a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir verdien for prioritet for en <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The `Priority` property is used to select a grammar when more than one grammar will produce an identical recognition result.
trans-unit.target: Den `Priority` egenskapen brukes til å velge en grammatikk når flere grammatikk vil gi en identiske recognition resultatet.

trans-unit.source: If a speech recognizer has more than one speech recognition grammar loaded and enabled that match the input, and the match is the best result from the recognizer, then the recognizer uses the grammar that has the highest `Priority`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en tale gjenkjenner har mer enn én tale recognition grammatikk lastet inn, og aktivert som samsvarer med de, og resultatet er best resultatet fra gjenkjenneren, må gjenkjenneren bruker grammatikk er den største `Priority`.

trans-unit.source: If the grammars that produce the identical recognition result also have the same `Priority` value, then the grammar that the recognizer uses is undefined.
trans-unit.target: Hvis grammars som produserer resultatet identiske recognition også ha samme `Priority` -verdi, deretter grammatikk gjenkjenneren bruker er ikke definert.

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_Priority" name="Priority" href=""></xref> property returns an integer value that represents the relative priority of a specific <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref uid="langword_csharp_Priority" name="Priority" href=""> </xref> egenskapen returnerer en heltallsverdi som representerer den relative prioriteten for en bestemt <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The range is from -128 to 127 inclusive.
trans-unit.target: Området er fra-128 til 127 med.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value with the name of a binary resource that was used to load the current <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi med navnet på en binær ressurs som ble brukt til å laste inn gjeldende <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_ResourceName" name="ResourceName" href=""></xref> property returns the name of the binary resource from which the strongly-typed grammar, used by <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref>, was loaded.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref uid="langword_csharp_ResourceName" name="ResourceName" href=""> </xref> egenskapen returnerer navnet på den binære ressursen som strongly-typed-grammatikk som <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref>, ble lastet inn.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the root rule or entry point of a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter navnet på roten regel eller oppføring senterpunktet for en <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: To construct a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object and set the name for its root rule, use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.%23ctor%2A> constructors that takes the `ruleName` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Ikke konstruere et <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objekt og angi navn for den primære regelen, bruk av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.%23ctor%2A>konstruktører som bruker den `ruleName` parameteren.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: If the root rule of a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> has no name, the property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis regelen roten av et <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>har ikke noe navn egenskapen returnerer `null`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: The root rules of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> instances constructed from <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> objects typically have no name, so RuleName returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Reglene roten for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>forekomster konstruert fra <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>objekter har vanligvis ikke noe navn regelnavn returnerer `null`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_RuleName" name="RuleName" href=""></xref> property returns the identifier for the root rule of the referenced speech recognition grammar.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref uid="langword_csharp_RuleName" name="RuleName" href=""> </xref> egenskapen returnerer identifikatoren for den primære regelen for refererte tale recognition grammatikk.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when a speech recognizer performs recognition using the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Starter når en tale gjenkjenner utfører recognition ved hjelp av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The speech recognizer also raises a `SpeechRecognized` event when it recognizes input.
trans-unit.target: Dikterings-gjenkjenner også opphøyer et `SpeechRecognized` -hendelse når den gjenkjenner inndata.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object's SpeechRecognized event is raised prior to the speech recognizer's `SpeechRecognized` event .
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objektets SpeechRecognized hendelsen starter før den tale gjenkjenneren `SpeechRecognized` hendelsen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> events.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName>, og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>hendelser.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Any tasks specific to a particular grammar should always be handled by handlers for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object's SpeechRecognized event.
trans-unit.target: Oppgaver som er spesifikke for en bestemt grammatikk skal alltid håndteres av behandlingsprogrammer for den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objektets SpeechRecognized hendelsen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_StgInit" name="StgInit" href=""></xref> method initializes a strongly-typed grammar.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref uid="langword_csharp_StgInit" name="StgInit" href=""> </xref> metoden initialiserer en strongly-typed grammatikk.

trans-unit.source: A strongly-typed <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object (`IsStg` equals `true`) can return strongly-typed results (objects, rather than raw text) to a client application.
trans-unit.target: En strongly-typed <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objektet (`IsStg` er lik `true`) kan returnere strongly-typed resultater (objekter i stedet raw tekst) til et klientprogram.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: For example, a strongly-typed grammar might return <xref:System.DateTime> objects rather than raw recognized input.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel en strongly-typed grammatikk kan returnere <xref:System.DateTime>objekter i stedet for rå gjenkjent inndata.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: You can implement strongly-typed grammars by attaching code to the rules of a grammar.
trans-unit.target: Du kan implementere strongly-typed grammars ved å knytte kode til reglene for en grammatikk.

trans-unit.source: As a recognition engine processes any given rule, taking as input the current partial results, the associated code is executed and the textual information becomes rich type objects.
trans-unit.target: Når en recognition-motor behandler alle typer regler, ta som inndata gjeldende delvise resultater, tilknyttede koden utføres og samme blir rik typen objekter.

trans-unit.source: This allows a client to more easily make use of enhanced semantic checking, support for multiple cultures, and internal grammar logic.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at en klient foreta enklere å bruke utvidet semantisk kontroll, støtte for flere kulturer og intern grammatikk logic.

trans-unit.source: Instances of strongly-typed <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects are typically obtained from resources in an assembly as a <xref:System.Type> of the Common Language Runtime (CLR).
trans-unit.target: Forekomster av strongly-typed <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objekter vanligvis er hentet fra ressurser i en samling som en <xref:System.Type>for Common Language Runtime (CLR).</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: The localized types used to support different languages are examples of such <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects.
trans-unit.target: Lokaliserte typene brukes til å støtte forskjellige språk er eksempler på for eksempel <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objekter.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: Parameters to be passed to initialize the strongly-typed grammar.This parameter may be null.
trans-unit.target: Parametere for å starte strongly-typed-grammatikk. Denne parameteren kan være null.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the weight value of a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tykkelse-verdien for en <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Because of the complexity of a recognition engine's use of **Weight**, its effect on a particular grammar's performance is not as directly predictable as that of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Priority%2A>.
trans-unit.target: På grunn av hvor komplekse en recognition-motor bruk av **vekt**, innvirkning på ytelsen for en bestemt grammatikk er ikke et prognoseattributt som direkte som <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Priority%2A>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Priority%2A>

trans-unit.source: Speech recognition is a weighted system.
trans-unit.target: Talegjenkjenning er et vektet system.

trans-unit.source: It evaluates all possible recognition paths based on a combination of the weight of the grammar, the weights defined for alternatives within the grammar, and the probabilities defined by speech models.
trans-unit.target: Den evaluerer alle mulige recognition baner som er basert på en kombinasjon av vekten for grammatikk, bredder definert etter alternativer i grammatikk og sannsynligheten som er definert av tale modeller.

trans-unit.source: The speech recognition engine uses the combination of these weights and probabilities to rank potential alternative recognitions.
trans-unit.target: Motor for talegjenkjenning bruker en kombinasjon av disse vekt og sannsynligheten til Ranger potensielle alternative anerkjennelser.

trans-unit.source: Grammars with higher weights will contribute more to the ranking of recognition alternatives than grammars with lower weights.
trans-unit.target: Grammars med høyere vekten bidrar mer til rangeringen av recognition alternativer enn grammars med lavere vekt.

trans-unit.source: The effect of the Weight property on a speech recognizer is dependent on the implementation of the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen vekt virker på en tale gjenkjenner avhengige implementeringen av gjenkjenneren.

trans-unit.source: Although the Weight property can be used to tune the accuracy of speech recognition for an application, it should be used only after controlled diagnostic study of a particular recognition environment and with full information about the recognition engine under use.
trans-unit.target: Selv om egenskapen vekt kan brukes til å justere nøyaktigheten av Talegjenkjenning for et program, skal den brukes bare når du har kontrollert diagnostic undersøkelsen for et bestemt recognition miljø og fullstendig informasjon om recognition motoren under bruk.

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_Weight" name="Weight" href=""></xref> property returns a floating point value indicating the relative weight that a recognition engine instance should assign to the grammar when processing speech input.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref uid="langword_csharp_Weight" name="Weight" href=""> </xref> returnerer et flyttall-verdi som angir den relative vekten som en forekomst av recognition motor som skal tilordnes grammatikk under behandling av tale inndata.

trans-unit.source: The range is from 0.0 to 1.0 inclusive.
trans-unit.target: Området ligger mellom 0,0 og 1,0 inklusive.

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.0.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er 1.0.
